rules_text:
Target player mills two cards.
Draw a card.
Coalesce {6}{U} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for {6}{U}. If you do, it enters as a Horror creature after it resolves. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]Terror is in the eye of the beholder.[/i]
